tag_list: iaas, paas, saas, cloud-computing, cloud-enablement, blogger, cloudinsights
overview:
Today, as part of the NewVem Insights team, I lead product and market knowledge generation and CloudInsights - a cloud computing community. NewVem Insights is a new start-up in the cloud computing market. The company aims to bring intelligence to the cloud including all of its different aspects.

On my previous adventure, I led ClickSoftware’s On-Demand (SaaS) initiative and also held several positions at Zarathustra SaaS development including ContractorOffice.com product manager and company CEO. In 2009, ClickSoftware acquired the AST group and Zarathustra as part of it.
